item.description:
Join P-Collective member Emily in celebrating Newport's Restaurant Week at the Inn at Castle Hill!

In true Restaurant Week tradition, the prixe fixe menu is $30 and includes three courses. Reservations are at 6:15 this Sunday evening - just in time to watch the sunset over Jamestown. Seating is limited (room for 8 only - and that was hard to get), so please RSVP or go on the waiting list if you're interested and a spot opens up.

Meet in front of the building at 6:10pm, or get there earlier if you want to stroll the grounds - its worth it.

Many thanks to Emily who came up with the idea and is spearheading the event!

Details on Castle Hill:
Sunday, March 21
6:15pm
Castle Hill Inn and Resort
590 Ocean Drive
Newport, Rhode Island 02840
item.how_to_find_us: Emily is hosting this one, please look at her picture!
item.name: Dinner in Newport - Castle Hill Inn & Resort
